remarks: The function/constant operation produces a function.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2017.)
statement:
ofcf.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. T ) ) -> ( x R y ) e. U ) $.
ofcf.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
ofcf.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ofcf.5 $e |- ( ph -> C e. T ) $.
ofcf $p |- ( ph -> ( F oFC R C ) : A --> U ) $.
$d C y $.
$d F x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d ph x y $.
